attributes.action: ensure the UK's Defence responsibilities are not outsourced to Private Security Companies (PSCs)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The use of Private Security Companies in Iraq and Afghanistan is illegal and in breach of International Law.

The continued use of the UK's Budget to pay Private Security Companies at the expense of protective equipment for British Soldiers is a lamentable decision.

Please ensure that PSCs are not used in lieu of British Armed Forces in support of UN Mandated Peace-keeping Missions, NATO Mandated Missions and/or any other foreign Missions.

Please direct all UK Government  Secretaries of State to ensure that their departments are not using British taxpayers funds in support of Privatization of Defence and/or Policing responsibility, by using PSCs.

Also, please ensure that Members of Parliament (MPs), ex-Military and other personnel do not benefit directly from PSCs.
